headline: Viatris Files Supplemental New Drug Applications to Japan's Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare for the Approval of EFFEXOR® for the Treatment of Generalized Anxiety Disorder
summary: Viatris Inc. (Nasdaq: VTRS), a global healthcare company, today announced it has filed applications to the Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare (MHLW) for approval of Effexor SR Capsules (venlafaxine hydrochloride), a serotonin-noradrenaline reuptake inhibitor (SNRI) to treat adults with generalized anxiety disorder (GAD), an indication for which no other treatment option is currently approved in Japan.
